scenes.description: Performance of the song "Slap by Step" by Pavolia Reine, Anya Melfissa, and Kureiji Ollie.
MC segment where the Hololive Indonesia members thank the audience and look forward to the new year.
Transition screen indicating the start of the '3rd STAGE'.
MC segment featuring Mori Calliope, Ninomae Ina'nis, and Takanashi Kiara from Hololive English Myth.
Performance of the song "Fortune Spinner" by Mori Calliope, Ninomae Ina'nis, and Takanashi Kiara.

subtitles.original: 歩く才色 / ヌランス・フロア
subtitles.english: Walking on the brilliant / nuance floor

subtitles.original: どんなヴェインな / 平手打ちを
subtitles.english: Any kind of vain / slap...

subtitles.original: ケチもはずかしがらないで
subtitles.english: Don't be stingy or shy about it

subtitles.original: 似合っているさ / コンプレス・ステップ
subtitles.english: It suits you, / this compress step

subtitles.original: Clap your hands and stand up please
subtitles.english: Clap your hands and stand up please

subtitles.original: 意気込んじゃっても / せばなるスレがソレさ
subtitles.english: Even if you're enthusiastic, / that's just the way it goes

subtitles.original: Clap your hands and stand up please
subtitles.english: Clap your hands and stand up please

subtitles.original: 時代を奪え / ジタバタはノーサ
subtitles.english: Seize the era, / no more flailing around

subtitles.original: Wearing my teeth...
subtitles.english: Wearing my teeth...

subtitles.original: ...and have no fear...
subtitles.english: ...and have no fear...

subtitles.original: Ready to breakthrough...
subtitles.english: Ready to breakthrough...
Appearance...

subtitles.original: キャッチ...
subtitles.english: Catching...

subtitles.original: 違っても同じ思いだ / どこからでも
subtitles.english: Even if we're different, we feel the same / no matter where from

subtitles.original: Slap by step / 360度私なりで
subtitles.english: Slap by step / 360 degrees, in my own way

subtitles.original: 突きあらば
subtitles.english: If there's an opening...

subtitles.original: その瞬間に感性がショーは今に
subtitles.english: In that moment, sensitivity—the show is now

subtitles.original: 沼にハマっちゃえよ
subtitles.english: Just fall into the depths

subtitles.original: 1 2 3 で真相 真理 クラッシュして
subtitles.english: Crash truth and reality with a 1 2 3

subtitles.original: 今すぐね
subtitles.english: Right now

subtitles.original: 私たちの色に染め上げた
subtitles.english: Dyed in our colors

subtitles.original: 世界を見せつけて
subtitles.english: Show off the world

subtitles.original: 皆様、今年もありがとうございましたですわ！
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you for this year!

subtitles.original: ホロIDはもっともっと盛り上がるよ！
subtitles.english: HoloID is going to get even more hyped!

subtitles.original: ずっと見てて！
subtitles.english: Keep watching!

subtitles.original: 来年もよろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Please look forward to us next year too!

subtitles.original: See you next year!
subtitles.english: See you next year!

subtitles.original: 皆さん、森カリオペです！
subtitles.english: Everyone, I'm Mori Calliope!

subtitles.original: What's up Hololive English Myth coming right at you for a brand new year!
subtitles.english: What's up Hololive English Myth coming right at you for a brand new year!

subtitles.original: 今年すごい盛り上がったね。
subtitles.english: This year was really exciting.

subtitles.original: 来年もよろしく！
subtitles.english: Looking forward to next year too!

subtitles.original: We're gonna rock the world ten times harder next year.
subtitles.english: We're gonna rock the world ten times harder next year.

subtitles.original: You in? Next up, Ina!
subtitles.english: You in? Next up, Ina!

subtitles.original: Wah! Hello everyone, this is Ina!
subtitles.english: Wah! Hello everyone, this is Ina!

subtitles.original: Thank you so much for a really fun 2025.
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for a really fun 2025.

subtitles.original: 今年すごく楽しかったです。
subtitles.english: This year was a lot of fun.

subtitles.original: 来年もよろしくお願いしますね。
subtitles.english: I look forward to working with you next year as well.

subtitles.original: Yeah, let's go!
subtitles.english: Yeah, let's go!

subtitles.original: Next is Kiara!
subtitles.english: Next is Kiara!

subtitles.original: Ha!
subtitles.english: Ha!

subtitles.original: キケリキ！小鳥遊キアラです！
subtitles.english: Kikiriki! I'm Takanashi Kiara!

subtitles.original: キアラらしく盛り上がるぞ！
subtitles.english: Let's get hyped, Kiara style!

subtitles.original: Dankeschön! Next, come on!
subtitles.english: Dankeschön! Next, come on!

subtitles.original: Let's have fun in 2026 too!
subtitles.english: Let's have fun in 2026 too!

subtitles.original: Let's go! やりましょうか。
subtitles.english: Let's go! Shall we start?

subtitles.original: 2026年もよろしく！
subtitles.english: Best regards for 2026 too!

subtitles.original: Alright, let's show them what we got!
subtitles.english: Alright, let's show them what we got!

subtitles.original: There's an answer out there somewhere / When the muses whisper truth or dare
subtitles.english: There's an answer out there somewhere / When the muses whisper truth or dare

subtitles.original: It's a fatefully tug of war / But no one's keeping score
subtitles.english: It's a fatefully tug of war / But no one's keeping score

subtitles.original: Set a course and be tenacious / 'Cause the future is a game of chance
subtitles.english: Set a course and be tenacious / 'Cause the future is a game of chance

subtitles.original: The chips are down but I'm a winner / I'll play until I win
subtitles.english: The chips are down but I'm a winner / I'll play until I win

subtitles.original: I'm not gonna give up yet / The wheels of fortune circle back around
subtitles.english: I'm not gonna give up yet / The wheels of fortune circle back around

subtitles.original: My future in the betting ring / A maze of outcomes drawn in golden strings
subtitles.english: My future in the betting ring / A maze of outcomes drawn in golden strings

subtitles.original: And through this tangled thread / I see what's up ahead
subtitles.english: And through this tangled thread / I see what's up ahead

subtitles.original: A wild chase, a better face / I've got to try my luck and spinning fate
subtitles.english: A wild chase, a better face / I've got to try my luck and spinning fate

subtitles.original: Spin the wheel, let's see where it falls / Testing the limits and betting it all
subtitles.english: Spin the wheel, let's see where it falls / Testing the limits and betting it all

subtitles.original: Round and round, jumping into the circle / Over and over, a test of will
subtitles.english: Round and round, jumping into the circle / Over and over, a test of will

subtitles.original: Though the game is never easy / And the outcome is a mystery
subtitles.english: Though the game is never easy / And the outcome is a mystery

subtitles.original: But these the fates we're betting on / Their threads unbroken
subtitles.english: But these the fates we're betting on / Their threads unbroken

subtitles.original: Called to life by flex and string / Casting lots together at the start of everything
subtitles.english: Called to life by flex and string / Casting lots together at the start of everything

subtitles.original: I'm not gonna give up yet / It spins back round with every chance I get
subtitles.english: I'm not gonna give up yet / It spins back round with every chance I get
